text: The CW announced the renewal Monday but has yet to confirm the show's endgame. The end of the road for The CW's Crazy Ex - Girlfriend is in sight. On Monday, the younger - skewing broadcast network announced that Crazy will return for a fourth run in the 2018 - 19 season. And, according to its star and co - creator, Rachel Bloom, that fourth run will be its final season. ` ` Just turned on my Wifi on our flight to Chicago and found out that # CrazyExGirlfriend has been renewed for a final season,'' Bloom tweeted Monday.
